==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=常娥}}
{{zh-wp|zh|en:Chang'e}}

===Etymology===
Euphemistic form of {{zh-m|姮娥}} from the [[Han]] dynasty, since {{zh-m|姮}} is homophonous with {{zh-m|恆}}, the personal name of {{w|Emperor Wen of Han}}.
